Hello blank fragment

Good question! Well, this is a food app where you can order any yummazing meal you love!! We recommend never to keep your tummy empty :) So, what are you waiting for? Sit back, relax and let us bring you your delicious foodz!!
Q.1 What is this app for?
Q.2. What functionality does the app provide?
If you don\'t have an account with us, be a part of our family by registering with us
Then, you can navigate to the restaurant of your choice and can add the food of your choice to your cart

The price of each item per person is mentioned along the item itself. You can order only one plate of an item. Though you can order as many dishes you want from that specific restaurant on which you are
Then, place your order by clicking on the "PROCEED TO CART" button which will appear on the screen
If your order is placed, you\'ll see a confirmation popup
Now...Now what? Just sit back, RELAX!! and let us serve you your mouth-watering order :)
Q.3. Who made this Yummazing app?
Well, I am Aneesh, a first year UND.GRAD persuing B.Tech from a renowned university, NSUT, Delhi. I love to code and my skill pool include ->
